---
title: "Services, value added per worker (constant 2010 US$)"
---


**Value added per worker** is a measure of labor productivityâ€”value added per unit of input. Value added denotes the net output of a sector after adding up all outputs and subtracting intermediate inputs. Data are in constant 2015 U.S. dollars. Services corresponds to the International Standard Industrial Classification (ISIC) tabulation categories G-P (revision 3) or tabulation categories G-U (revision 4), and includes wholesale and retail trade and restaurants and hotels; transport, storage, and communications; financing, insurance, real estate, and business services; and community, social and personal services.

* **ID:** NV.SRV.EMPL.KD
* **Source:** World Bank national accounts data, and OECD National Accounts data files.
* **Periodicity:** Annual
* **Topic:** Economic Policy & Debt: National accounts: US$ at current prices: Aggregate indicators

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
library(WDI)
dat = WDI(indicator='NV.SRV.EMPL.KD', country='all', start=1960, end=2022)

library(downloadthis)

dat %>%
  download_this(
    output_name = "NV.SRV.EMPL.KD",
    output_extension = ".xlsx",
    button_label = "Download data as xlsx",
    button_type = "primary",
    has_icon = TRUE,
    icon = "fa fa-save"
  )

dat %>%
  download_this(
    output_name = "NV.SRV.EMPL.KD",
    output_extension = ".csv",
    button_label = "Download data as csv",
    button_type = "success",
    has_icon = TRUE,
    icon = "fa fa-save"
  )
```

### Evolution of the indicator from 1960 to 2022



```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
dat2 = WDI(indicator='NV.SRV.EMPL.KD', country=c('Z4','Z7','ZJ','ZQ','XU','8S','ZG'), start=1960, end=2022)
library(plotly)
plot_ly(dat2, x = ~year, y = ~NV.SRV.EMPL.KD) %>%
  add_lines(linetype = ~country)
```

### Value of the indicator in 2021


```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
library(knitr)
newdata <- dat[ which(dat$year==2021), ]
x=newdata$country
y=newdata$NV.SRV.EMPL.KD
z=as.data.frame(cbind(x,y))
names(z)=c('Country','Value')
knitr::kable(z,digits =2, align = "ll")
```
